            #[doc = concat!("let view: &mut [", stringify!($int_type), "] = ", stringify!($atomic_type), "::get_mut_slice(&mut some_ints);")]

            

        

            

                2741
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// assert_eq!(view, [0; 10]);

            

        

            

                2742
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// view

            

        

            

                2743
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///     .iter_mut()

            

        

            

                2744
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///     .enumerate()

            

        

            

                2745
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///     .for_each(|(idx, int)| *int = idx as _);

            

        

            

                2746
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///

            

        

            

                2747
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// std::thread::scope(|s| {

            

        

            

                2748
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///     some_ints

            

        

            

                2749
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///         .iter()

            

        

            

                2750
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///         .enumerate()

            

        

            

                2751
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///         .for_each(|(idx, int)| {

            

        

            

                2752
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///             s.spawn(move || assert_eq!(int.load(Ordering::Relaxed), idx as _));

            

        

            

                2753
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///         })

            

        

            

                2754
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// });

            

        

            

                2755
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// ```

            

        

            

                2756
            

            

                
            

            

                
            #[inline]

            

        

            

                2757
            

            

                
            

            

                
            #[unstable(feature = "atomic_from_mut", issue = "76314")]

            

        

            

                2758
            

            

                
            

            

                
            pub fn get_mut_slice(this: &mut [Self]) -> &mut [$int_type] {

            

        

            

                2759
            

            

                
            

            

                
                // SAFETY: the mutable reference guarantees unique ownership.

            

        

            

                2760
            

            

                
            

            

                
                unsafe { &mut *(this as *mut [Self] as *mut [$int_type]) }

            

        

            

                2761
            

            

                
            

            

                
            }

            

        

            

                2762
            

            

                
            

            

                

            

        

            

                2763
            

            

                
            

            

                
            #[doc = concat!("Get atomic access to a `&mut [", stringify!($int_type), "]` slice.")]

            

        

            

                2764
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///

            

        

            

                2765
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// # Examples

            

        

            

                2766
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///

            

        

            

                2767
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// ```

            

        

            

                2768
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// #![feature(atomic_from_mut)]

            

        

            

                2769
            

            

                
            

            

                
            #[doc = concat!($extra_feature, "use std::sync::atomic::{", stringify!($atomic_type), ", Ordering};")]

            

        

            

                2770
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///

            

        

            

                2771
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// let mut some_ints = [0; 10];

            

        

            

                2772
            

            

                
            

            

                
            #[doc = concat!("let a = &*", stringify!($atomic_type), "::from_mut_slice(&mut some_ints);")]

            

        

            

                2773
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// std::thread::scope(|s| {

            

        

            

                2774
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///     for i in 0..a.len() {

            

        

            

                2775
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///         s.spawn(move || a[i].store(i as _, Ordering::Relaxed));

            

        

            

                2776
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///     }

            

        

            

                2777
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// });

            

        

            

                2778
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// for (i, n) in some_ints.into_iter().enumerate() {

            

        

            

                2779
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///     assert_eq!(i, n as usize);

            

        

            

                2780
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// }

            

        

            

                2781
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// ```

            

        

            

                2782
            

            

                
            

            

                
            #[inline]

            

        

            

                2783
            

            

                
            

            

                
            #[$cfg_align]

            

        

            

                2784
            

            

                
            

            

                
            #[unstable(feature = "atomic_from_mut", issue = "76314")]

            

        

            

                2785
            

            

                
            

            

                
            pub fn from_mut_slice(v: &mut [$int_type]) -> &mut [Self] {

            

        

            

                2786
            

            

                
            

            

                
                let [] = [(); align_of::<Self>() - align_of::<$int_type>()];

            

        

            

                2787
            

            

                
            

            

                
                // SAFETY:

            

        

            

                2788
            

            

                
            

            

                
                //  - the mutable reference guarantees unique ownership.

            

        

            

                2789
            

            

                
            

            

                
                //  - the alignment of `$int_type` and `Self` is the

            

        

            

                2790
            

            

                
            

            

                
                //    same, as promised by $cfg_align and verified above.

            

        

            

                2791
            

            

                
            

            

                
                unsafe { &mut *(v as *mut [$int_type] as *mut [Self]) }

            

        

            

                2792
            

            

                
            

            

                
            }

            

        

            

                2793
            

            

                
            

            

                

            

        

            

                2794
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// Consumes the atomic and returns the contained value.

            

        

            

                2795
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///

            

        

            

                2796
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// This is safe because passing `self` by value guarantees that no other threads are

            

        

            

                2797
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// concurrently accessing the atomic data.

            

        

            

                2798
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///

            

        

            

                2799
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// # Examples

            

        

            

                2800
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///

            

        

            

                2801
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// ```

            

        

            

                2802
            

            

                
            

            

                
            #[doc = concat!($extra_feature, "use std::sync::atomic::", stringify!($atomic_type), ";")]

            

        

            

                2803
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///

            

        

            

                2804
            

            

                
            

            

                
            #[doc = concat!("let some_var = ", stringify!($atomic_type), "::new(5);")]

            

        

            

                2805
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// assert_eq!(some_var.into_inner(), 5);

            

        

            

                2806
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// ```

            

        

            

                2807
            

            

                
            

            

                
            #[inline]

            

        

            

                2808
            

            

                
            

            

                
            #[$stable_access]

            

        

            

                2809
            

            

                
            

            

                
            #[$const_stable_into_inner]

            

        

            

                2810
            

            

                
            

            

                
            pub const fn into_inner(self) -> $int_type {

            

        

            

                2811
            

            

                
            

            

                
                self.v.into_inner()

            

        

            

                2812
            

            

                
            

            

                
            }

            

        

            

                2813
            

            

                
            

            

                

            

        

            

                2814
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// Loads a value from the atomic integer.

            

        

            

                2815
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///

            

        

            

                2816
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// `load` takes an [`Ordering`] argument which describes the memory ordering of this operation.

            

        

            

                2817
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// Possible values are [`SeqCst`], [`Acquire`] and [`Relaxed`].

            

        

            

                2818
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///

            

        

            

                2819
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// # Panics

            

        

            

                2820
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///

            

        

            

                2821
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// Panics if `order` is [`Release`] or [`AcqRel`].

            

        

            

                2822
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///

            

        

            

                2823
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// # Examples

            

        

            

                2824

                2825
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// ```

            

        

            

                2826
            

            

                
            

            

                
            #[doc = concat!($extra_feature, "use std::sync::atomic::{", stringify!($atomic_type), ", Ordering};")]

            

        

            

                2827
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///

            

        

            

                2828
            

            

                
            

            

                
            #[doc = concat!("let some_var = ", stringify!($atomic_type), "::new(5);")]

            

        

            

                2829
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///

            

        

            

                2830
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// assert_eq!(some_var.load(Ordering::Relaxed), 5);

            

        

            

                2831
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// ```

            

        

            

                2832
            

            

                
            

            

                
            #[inline]

            

        

            

                2833
            

            

                
            

            

                
            #[$stable]

            

        

            

                2834
            

            

                
            

            

                
            #[cfg_attr(miri, track_caller)] // even without panics, this helps for Miri backtraces

            

        

            

                2835
            

            

                299424
            

            

                
            pub fn load(&self, order: Ordering) -> $int_type {

            

        

            

                2836
            

            

                
            

            

                
                // SAFETY: data races are prevented by atomic intrinsics.

            

        

            

                2837
            

            

                299424
            

            

                
                unsafe { atomic_load(self.v.get(), order) }

            

        

            

                2838
            

            

                299424
            

            

                
            }

            

        

            

                2839
            

            

                
            

            

                

            

        

            

                2840
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// Stores a value into the atomic integer.

            

        

            

                2841
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///

            

        

            

                2842
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// `store` takes an [`Ordering`] argument which describes the memory ordering of this operation.

            

        

            

                2843
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///  Possible values are [`SeqCst`], [`Release`] and [`Relaxed`].

            

        

            

                2844
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///

            

        

            

                2845
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// # Panics

            

        

            

                2846
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///

            

        

            

                2847
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// Panics if `order` is [`Acquire`] or [`AcqRel`].

            

        

            

                2848
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///

            

        

            

                2849
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// # Examples

            

        

            

                2850
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///

            

        

            

                2851
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// ```

            

        

            

                2852
            

            

                
            

            

                
            #[doc = concat!($extra_feature, "use std::sync::atomic::{", stringify!($atomic_type), ", Ordering};")]

            

        

            

                2853
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///

            

        

            

                2854
            

            

                
            

            

                
            #[doc = concat!("let some_var = ", stringify!($atomic_type), "::new(5);")]

            

        

            

                2855
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///

            

        

            

                2856
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// some_var.store(10, Ordering::Relaxed);

            

        

            

                2857
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// assert_eq!(some_var.load(Ordering::Relaxed), 10);

            

        

            

                2858
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// ```

            

        

            

                2859
            

            

                
            

            

                
            #[inline]

            

        

            

                2860
            

            

                
            

            

                
            #[$stable]

            

        

            

                2861
            

            

                
            

            

                
            #[cfg_attr(miri, track_caller)] // even without panics, this helps for Miri backtraces

            

        

            

                2862
            

            

                13386
            

            

                
            pub fn store(&self, val: $int_type, order: Ordering) {

            

        

            

                2863
            

            

                
            

            

                
                // SAFETY: data races are prevented by atomic intrinsics.

            

        

            

                2864
            

            

                13386
            

            

                
                unsafe { atomic_store(self.v.get(), val, order); }

            

        

            

                2865
            

            

                13386
            

            

                
            }

            

        

            

                2866
            

            

                
            

            

                

            

        

            

                2867
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// Stores a value into the atomic integer, returning the previous value.

            

        

            

                2868
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///

            

        

            

                2869
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// `swap` takes an [`Ordering`] argument which describes the memory ordering

            

        

            

                2870
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// of this operation. All ordering modes are possible. Note that using

            

        

            

                2871
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// [`Acquire`] makes the store part of this operation [`Relaxed`], and

            

        

            

                2872
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// using [`Release`] makes the load part [`Relaxed`].

            

        

            

                2873
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///

            

        

            

                2874
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// **Note**: This method is only available on platforms that support atomic operations on

            

        

            

                2875
            

            

                
            

            

                
            #[doc = concat!("[`", $s_int_type, "`].")]

            

        

            

                2876
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///

            

        

            

                2877
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// # Examples

            

        

            

                2878
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///

            

        

            

                2879
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// ```

            

        

            

                2880
            

            

                
            

            

                
            #[doc = concat!($extra_feature, "use std::sync::atomic::{", stringify!($atomic_type), ", Ordering};")]

            

        

            

                2881
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///

            

        

            

                2882
            

            

                
            

            

                
            #[doc = concat!("let some_var = ", stringify!($atomic_type), "::new(5);")]

            

        

            

                2883
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///

            

        

            

                2884
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// assert_eq!(some_var.swap(10, Ordering::Relaxed), 5);

            

        

            

                2885
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// ```

            

        

            

                2886
            

            

                
            

            

                
            #[inline]

            

        

            

                2887
            

            

                
            

            

                
            #[$stable]

            

        

            

                2888
            

            

                
            

            

                
            #[$cfg_cas]

            

        

            

                2889
            

            

                
            

            

                
            #[cfg_attr(miri, track_caller)] // even without panics, this helps for Miri backtraces

            

        

            

                2890
            

            

                61204
            

            

                
            pub fn swap(&self, val: $int_type, order: Ordering) -> $int_type {

            

        

            

                2891
            

            

                
            

            

                
                // SAFETY: data races are prevented by atomic intrinsics.

            

        

            

                2892
            

            

                61204
            

            

                
                unsafe { atomic_swap(self.v.get(), val, order) }

            

        

            

                2893
            

            

                61204
            

            

                
            }

            

        

            

                2894
            

            

                
            

            

                

            

        

            

                2895
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// Stores a value into the atomic integer if the current value is the same as

            

        

            

                2896
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// the `current` value.

            

        

            

                2897
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///

            

        

            

                2898
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// The return value is always the previous value. If it is equal to `current`, then the

            

        

            

                2899
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// value was updated.

            

        

            

                2900
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///

            

        

            

                2901
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// `compare_and_swap` also takes an [`Ordering`] argument which describes the memory

            

        

            

                2902
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// ordering of this operation. Notice that even when using [`AcqRel`], the operation

            

        

            

                2903
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// might fail and hence just perform an `Acquire` load, but not have `Release` semantics.

            

        

            

                2904
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// Using [`Acquire`] makes the store part of this operation [`Relaxed`] if it

            

        

            

                2905
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// happens, and using [`Release`] makes the load part [`Relaxed`].

            

        

            

                2906
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///

            

        

            

                2907
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// **Note**: This method is only available on platforms that support atomic operations on

            

        

            

                2908
            

            

                
            

            

                
            #[doc = concat!("[`", $s_int_type, "`].")]

            

        

            

                2909
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///

            

        

            

                2910
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// # Migrating to `compare_exchange` and `compare_exchange_weak`

            

        

            

                2911
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///

            

        

            

                2912
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// `compare_and_swap` is equivalent to `compare_exchange` with the following mapping for

            

        

            

                2913
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// memory orderings:

            

        

            

                2914
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///

            

        

            

                2915
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// Original | Success | Failure

            

        

            

                2916
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// -------- | ------- | -------

            

        

            

                2917
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// Relaxed  | Relaxed | Relaxed

            

        

            

                2918
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// Acquire  | Acquire | Acquire

            

        

            

                2919
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// Release  | Release | Relaxed

            

        

            

                2920
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// AcqRel   | AcqRel  | Acquire

            

        

            

                2921
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// SeqCst   | SeqCst  | SeqCst

            

        

            

                2922
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///

            

        

            

                2923
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// `compare_and_swap` and `compare_exchange` also differ in their return type. You can use

            

        

            

                2924
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// `compare_exchange(...).unwrap_or_else(|x| x)` to recover the behavior of `compare_and_swap`,

            

        

            

                2925
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// but in most cases it is more idiomatic to check whether the return value is `Ok` or `Err`

            

        

            

                2926
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// rather than to infer success vs failure based on the value that was read.

            

        

            

                2927
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///

            

        

            

                2928
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// During migration, consider whether it makes sense to use `compare_exchange_weak` instead.

            

        

            

                2929
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// `compare_exchange_weak` is allowed to fail spuriously even when the comparison succeeds,

            

        

            

                2930
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// which allows the compiler to generate better assembly code when the compare and swap

            

        

            

                2931
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// is used in a loop.

            

        

            

                2932
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///

            

        

            

                2933
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// # Examples

            

        

            

                2934
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///

            

        

            

                2935
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// ```

            

        

            

                2936
            

            

                
            

            

                
            #[doc = concat!($extra_feature, "use std::sync::atomic::{", stringify!($atomic_type), ", Ordering};")]

            

        

            

                2937
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///

            

        

            

                2938
            

            

                
            

            

                
            #[doc = concat!("let some_var = ", stringify!($atomic_type), "::new(5);")]

            

        

            

                2939
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///

            

        

            

                2940
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// assert_eq!(some_var.compare_and_swap(5, 10, Ordering::Relaxed), 5);

            

        

            

                2941
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// assert_eq!(some_var.load(Ordering::Relaxed), 10);

            

        

            

                2942
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///

            

        

            

                2943
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// assert_eq!(some_var.compare_and_swap(6, 12, Ordering::Relaxed), 10);

            

        

            

                2944
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// assert_eq!(some_var.load(Ordering::Relaxed), 10);

            

        

            

                2945
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// ```

            

        

            

                2946
            

            

                
            

            

                
            #[inline]

            

        

            

                2947
            

            

                
            

            

                
            #[$stable]

            

        

            

                2948
            

            

                
            

            

                
            #[deprecated(

            

        

            

                2949
            

            

                
            

            

                
                since = "1.50.0",

            

        

            

                2950
            

            

                
            

            

                
                note = "Use `compare_exchange` or `compare_exchange_weak` instead")

            

        

            

                2951
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ]

            

        

            

                2952
            

            

                
            

            

                
            #[$cfg_cas]

            

        

            

                2953
            

            

                
            

            

                
            #[cfg_attr(miri, track_caller)] // even without panics, this helps for Miri backtraces

            

        

            

                2954
            

            

                
            

            

                
            pub fn compare_and_swap(&self,

            

        

            

                2955
            

            

                
            

            

                
                                    current: $int_type,

            

        

            

                2956
            

            

                
            

            

                
                                    new: $int_type,

            

        

            

                2957
            

            

                
            

            

                
                                    order: Ordering) -> $int_type {

            

        

            

                2958
            

            

                
            

            

                
                match self.compare_exchange(current,

            

        

            

                2959
            

            

                
            

            

                
                                            new,

            

        

            

                2960
            

            

                
            

            

                
                                            order,

            

        

            

                2961
            

            

                
            

            

                
                                            strongest_failure_ordering(order)) {

            

        

            

                2962
            

            

                
            

            

                
                    Ok(x) => x,

            

        

            

                2963
            

            

                
            

            

                
                    Err(x) => x,

            

        

            

                2964
            

            

                
            

            

                
                }

            

        

            

                2965
            

            

                
            

            

                
            }

            

        

            

                2966
            

            

                
            

            

                

            

        

            

                2967
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// Stores a value into the atomic integer if the current value is the same as

            

        

            

                2968
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// the `current` value.

            

        

            

                2969
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///

            

        

            

                2970
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// The return value is a result indicating whether the new value was written and

            

        

            

                2971
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// containing the previous value. On success this value is guaranteed to be equal to

            

        

            

                2972
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// `current`.

            

        

            

                2973
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///

            

        

            

                2974
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// `compare_exchange` takes two [`Ordering`] arguments to describe the memory

            

        

            

                2975
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// ordering of this operation. `success` describes the required ordering for the

            

        

            

                2976
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// read-modify-write operation that takes place if the comparison with `current` succeeds.

            

        

            

                2977
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// `failure` describes the required ordering for the load operation that takes place when

            

        

            

                2978
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// the comparison fails. Using [`Acquire`] as success ordering makes the store part

            

        

            

                2979
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// of this operation [`Relaxed`], and using [`Release`] makes the successful load

            

        

            

                2980
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// [`Relaxed`]. The failure ordering can only be [`SeqCst`], [`Acquire`] or [`Relaxed`].

            

        

            

                2981
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///

            

        

            

                2982
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// **Note**: This method is only available on platforms that support atomic operations on

            

        

            

                2983
            

            

                
            

            

                
            #[doc = concat!("[`", $s_int_type, "`].")]

            

        

            

                2984
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///

            

        

            

                2985
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// # Examples

            

        

            

                2986
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///

            

        

            

                2987
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// ```

            

        

            

                2988
            

            

                
            

            

                
            #[doc = concat!($extra_feature, "use std::sync::atomic::{", stringify!($atomic_type), ", Ordering};")]

            

        

            

                2989
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///

            

        

            

                2990
            

            

                
            

            

                
            #[doc = concat!("let some_var = ", stringify!($atomic_type), "::new(5);")]

            

        

            

                2991
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///

            

        

            

                2992
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// assert_eq!(some_var.compare_exchange(5, 10,

            

        

            

                2993
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///                                      Ordering::Acquire,

            

        

            

                2994
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///                                      Ordering::Relaxed),

            

        

            

                2995
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///            Ok(5));

            

        

            

                2996
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// assert_eq!(some_var.load(Ordering::Relaxed), 10);

            

        

            

                2997
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///

            

        

            

                2998
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// assert_eq!(some_var.compare_exchange(6, 12,

            

        

            

                2999
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///                                      Ordering::SeqCst,

            

        

            

                3000
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///                                      Ordering::Acquire),

            

        

            

                3001
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///            Err(10));

            

        

            

                3002
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// assert_eq!(some_var.load(Ordering::Relaxed), 10);

            

        

            

                3003
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// ```

            

        

            

                3004
            

            

                
            

            

                
            #[inline]

            

        

            

                3005
            

            

                
            

            

                
            #[$stable_cxchg]

            

        

            

                3006
            

            

                
            

            

                
            #[$cfg_cas]

            

        

            

                3007
            

            

                
            

            

                
            #[cfg_attr(miri, track_caller)] // even without panics, this helps for Miri backtraces

            

        

            

                3008
            

            

                62084
            

            

                
            pub fn compare_exchange(&self,

            

        

            

                3009
            

            

                62084
            

            

                
                                    current: $int_type,

            

        

            

                3010
            

            

                62084
            

            

                
                                    new: $int_type,

            

        

            

                3011
            

            

                62084
            

            

                
                                    success: Ordering,

            

        

            

                3012
            

            

                62084
            

            

                
                                    failure: Ordering) -> Result<$int_type, $int_type> {

            

        

            

                3013
            

            

                
            

            

                
                // SAFETY: data races are prevented by atomic intrinsics.

            

        

            

                3014
            

            

                62084
            

            

                
                unsafe { atomic_compare_exchange(self.v.get(), current, new, success, failure) }

            

        

            

                3015
            

            

                62084
            

            

                
            }

            

        

            

                3016
            

            

                
            

            

                

            

        

            

                3017
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// Stores a value into the atomic integer if the current value is the same as

            

        

            

                3018
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// the `current` value.

            

        

            

                3019
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///

            

        

            

                3020
            

            

                
            

            

                
            #[doc = concat!("Unlike [`", stringify!($atomic_type), "::compare_exchange`],")]

            

        

            

                3021
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// this function is allowed to spuriously fail even

            

        

            

                3022
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// when the comparison succeeds, which can result in more efficient code on some

            

        

            

                3023
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// platforms. The return value is a result indicating whether the new value was

            

        

            

                3024
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// written and containing the previous value.

            

        

            

                3025
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///

            

        

            

                3026
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// `compare_exchange_weak` takes two [`Ordering`] arguments to describe the memory

            

        

            

                3027
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// ordering of this operation. `success` describes the required ordering for the

            

        

            

                3028
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// read-modify-write operation that takes place if the comparison with `current` succeeds.

            

        

            

                3029
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// `failure` describes the required ordering for the load operation that takes place when

            

        

            

                3030
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// the comparison fails. Using [`Acquire`] as success ordering makes the store part

            

        

            

                3031
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// of this operation [`Relaxed`], and using [`Release`] makes the successful load

            

        

            

                3032
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// [`Relaxed`]. The failure ordering can only be [`SeqCst`], [`Acquire`] or [`Relaxed`].

            

        

            

                3033
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///

            

        

            

                3034
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// **Note**: This method is only available on platforms that support atomic operations on

            

        

            

                3035
            

            

                
            

            

                
            #[doc = concat!("[`", $s_int_type, "`].")]

            

        

            

                3036
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///

            

        

            

                3037
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// # Examples

            

        

            

                3038
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///

            

        

            

                3039
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// ```

            

        

            

                3040
            

            

                
            

            

                
            #[doc = concat!($extra_feature, "use std::sync::atomic::{", stringify!($atomic_type), ", Ordering};")]

            

        

            

                3041
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///

            

        

            

                3042
            

            

                
            

            

                
            #[doc = concat!("let val = ", stringify!($atomic_type), "::new(4);")]

            

        

            

                3043
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///

            

        

            

                3044
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// let mut old = val.load(Ordering::Relaxed);

            

        

            

                3045
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// loop {

            

        

            

                3046
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///     let new = old * 2;

            

        

            

                3047
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///     match val.compare_exchange_weak(old, new, Ordering::SeqCst, Ordering::Relaxed) {

            

        

            

                3048
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///         Ok(_) => break,

            

        

            

                3049
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///         Err(x) => old = x,

            

        

            

                3050
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///     }

            

        

            

                3051
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// }

            

        

            

                3052
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// ```

            

        

            

                3053
            

            

                
            

            

                
            #[inline]

            

        

            

                3054

                3055
            

            

                
            

            

                
            #[$cfg_cas]

            

        

            

                3056
            

            

                
            

            

                
            #[cfg_attr(miri, track_caller)] // even without panics, this helps for Miri backtraces

            

        

            

                3057
            

            

                4796
            

            

                
            pub fn compare_exchange_weak(&self,

            

        

            

                3058
            

            

                4796
            

            

                
                                         current: $int_type,

            

        

            

                3059
            

            

                4796

                3060
            

            

                4796

                3061
            

            

                4796

                3062
            

            

                
            

            

                
                // SAFETY: data races are prevented by atomic intrinsics.

            

        

            

                3063
            

            

                
            

            

                
                unsafe {

            

        

            

                3064
            

            

                4796
            

            

                
                    atomic_compare_exchange_weak(self.v.get(), current, new, success, failure)

            /// Adds to the current value, returning the previous value.

            

        

            

                3069
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///

            

        

            

                3070
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// This operation wraps around on overflow.

            

        

            

                3071
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///

            

        

            

                3072
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// `fetch_add` takes an [`Ordering`] argument which describes the memory ordering

            

        

            

                3073
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// of this operation. All ordering modes are possible. Note that using

            

        

            

                3074
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// [`Acquire`] makes the store part of this operation [`Relaxed`], and

            

        

            

                3075
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// using [`Release`] makes the load part [`Relaxed`].

            

        

            

                3076
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///

            

        

            

                3077
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// **Note**: This method is only available on platforms that support atomic operations on

            

        

            

                3078
            

            

                
            

            

                
            #[doc = concat!("[`", $s_int_type, "`].")]

            

        

            

                3079
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///

            

        

            

                3080
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// # Examples

            

        

            

                3081
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///

            

        

            

                3082
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// ```

            

        

            

                3083
            

            

                
            

            

                
            #[doc = concat!($extra_feature, "use std::sync::atomic::{", stringify!($atomic_type), ", Ordering};")]

            

        

            

                3084
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///

            

        

            

                3085
            

            

                
            

            

                
            #[doc = concat!("let foo = ", stringify!($atomic_type), "::new(0);")]

            

        

            

                3086
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// assert_eq!(foo.fetch_add(10, Ordering::SeqCst), 0);

            

        

            

                3087
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// assert_eq!(foo.load(Ordering::SeqCst), 10);

            

        

            

                3088
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// ```

            

        

            

                3089
            

            

                
            

            

                
            #[inline]

            

        

            

                3090
            

            

                
            

            

                
            #[$stable]

            

        

            

                3091
            

            

                
            

            

                
            #[$cfg_cas]

            

        

            

                3092
            

            

                
            

            

                
            #[cfg_attr(miri, track_caller)] // even without panics, this helps for Miri backtraces

            

        

            

                3093
            

            

                39422
            

            

                
            pub fn fetch_add(&self, val: $int_type, order: Ordering) -> $int_type {

            

        

            

                3094
            

            

                
            

            

                
                // SAFETY: data races are prevented by atomic intrinsics.

            

        

            

                3095
            

            

                39422
            

            

                
                unsafe { atomic_add(self.v.get(), val, order) }

            

        

            

                3096
            

            

                39422
            

            

                
            }
