                3254
            

            

                
            

            

                
            #[cfg_attr(miri, track_caller)] // even without panics, this helps for Miri backtraces

            

        

            

                3255
            

            

                2
            

            

                
            pub fn fetch_xor(&self, val: $int_type, order: Ordering) -> $int_type {

            

        

            

                3256
            

            

                
            

            

                
                // SAFETY: data races are prevented by atomic intrinsics.

            

        

            

                3257
            

            

                2
            

            

                
                unsafe { atomic_xor(self.v.get(), val, order) }

            

        

            

                3258
            

            

                2
            

            

                
            }

            

        

            

                3259
            

            

                
            

            

                

            

        

            

                3260
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// Fetches the value, and applies a function to it that returns an optional

            

        

            

                3261
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// new value. Returns a `Result` of `Ok(previous_value)` if the function returned `Some(_)`, else

            

        

            

                3262
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// `Err(previous_value)`.

            

        

            

                3263
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///

            

        

            

                3264
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// Note: This may call the function multiple times if the value has been changed from other threads in

            

        

            

                3265
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// the meantime, as long as the function returns `Some(_)`, but the function will have been applied

            

        

            

                3266
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// only once to the stored value.

            

        

            

                3267
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///

            

        

            

                3268
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// `fetch_update` takes two [`Ordering`] arguments to describe the memory ordering of this operation.

            

        

            

                3269
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// The first describes the required ordering for when the operation finally succeeds while the second

            

        

            

                3270
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// describes the required ordering for loads. These correspond to the success and failure orderings of

            

        

            

                3271
            

            

                
            

            

                
            #[doc = concat!("[`", stringify!($atomic_type), "::compare_exchange`]")]

            

        

            

                3272
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// respectively.

            

        

            

                3273
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///

            

        

            

                3274
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// Using [`Acquire`] as success ordering makes the store part

            

        

            

                3275
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// of this operation [`Relaxed`], and using [`Release`] makes the final successful load

            

        

            

                3276
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// [`Relaxed`]. The (failed) load ordering can only be [`SeqCst`], [`Acquire`] or [`Relaxed`].

            

        

            

                3277
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///

            

        

            

                3278
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// **Note**: This method is only available on platforms that support atomic operations on

            

        

            

                3279
            

            

                
            

            

                
            #[doc = concat!("[`", $s_int_type, "`].")]

            

        

            

                3280
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///

            

        

            

                3281
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// # Considerations

            

        

            

                3282
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///

            

        

            

                3283
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// This method is not magic; it is not provided by the hardware.

            

        

            

                3284
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// It is implemented in terms of

            

        

            

                3285
            

            

                
            

            

                
            #[doc = concat!("[`", stringify!($atomic_type), "::compare_exchange_weak`],")]

            

        

            

                3286
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// and suffers from the same drawbacks.

            

        

            

                3287
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// In particular, this method will not circumvent the [ABA Problem].

            

        

            

                3288
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///

            

        

            

                3289
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// [ABA Problem]: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ABA_problem

            

        

            

                3290
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///

            

        

            

                3291
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// # Examples

            

        

            

                3292
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///

            

        

            

                3293
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// ```rust

            

        

            

                3294
            

            

                
            

            

                
            #[doc = concat!($extra_feature, "use std::sync::atomic::{", stringify!($atomic_type), ", Ordering};")]

            

        

            

                3295
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///

            

        

            

                3296
            

            

                
            

            

                
            #[doc = concat!("let x = ", stringify!($atomic_type), "::new(7);")]

            

        

            

                3297
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// assert_eq!(x.fetch_update(Ordering::SeqCst, Ordering::SeqCst, |_| None), Err(7));

            

        

            

                3298
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// assert_eq!(x.fetch_update(Ordering::SeqCst, Ordering::SeqCst, |x| Some(x + 1)), Ok(7));

            

        

            

                3299
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// assert_eq!(x.fetch_update(Ordering::SeqCst, Ordering::SeqCst, |x| Some(x + 1)), Ok(8));

            

        

            

                3300
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// assert_eq!(x.load(Ordering::SeqCst), 9);

            

        

            

                3301
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// ```

            

        

            

                3302
            

            

                
            

            

                
            #[inline]

            

        

            

                3303
            

            

                
            

            

                
            #[stable(feature = "no_more_cas", since = "1.45.0")]

            

        

            

                3304
            

            

                
            

            

                
            #[$cfg_cas]

            

        

            

                3305
            

            

                
            

            

                
            #[cfg_attr(miri, track_caller)] // even without panics, this helps for Miri backtraces

            

        

            

                3306
            

            

                
            

            

                
            pub fn fetch_update<F>(&self,

            

        

            

                3307
            

            

                
            

            

                
                                   set_order: Ordering,

            

        

            

                3308
            

            

                
            

            

                
                                   fetch_order: Ordering,

            

        

            

                3309
            

            

                
            

            

                
                                   mut f: F) -> Result<$int_type, $int_type>

            

        

            

                3310
            

            

                
            

            

                
            where F: FnMut($int_type) -> Option<$int_type> {

            

        

            

                3311
            

            

                
            

            

                
                let mut prev = self.load(fetch_order);

            

        

            

                3312
            

            

                
            

            

                
                while let Some(next) = f(prev) {

            

        

            

                3313
            

            

                
            

            

                
                    match self.compare_exchange_weak(prev, next, set_order, fetch_order) {

            

        

            

                3314
            

            

                
            

            

                
                        x @ Ok(_) => return x,

            

        

            

                3315
            

            

                
            

            

                
                        Err(next_prev) => prev = next_prev

            

        

            

                3316
            

            

                
            

            

                
                    }

            

        

            

                3317
            

            

                
            

            

                
                }

            

        

            

                3318
            

            

                
            

            

                
                Err(prev)

            

        

            

                3319
            

            

                
            

            

                
            }

            

        

            

                3320
            

            

                
            

            

                

            

        

            

                3321
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// Fetches the value, and applies a function to it that returns an optional

            

        

            

                3322
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// new value. Returns a `Result` of `Ok(previous_value)` if the function returned `Some(_)`, else

            

        

            

                3323
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// `Err(previous_value)`.

            

        

            

                3324
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///

            

        

            

                3325
            

            

                
            

            

                
            #[doc = concat!("See also: [`update`](`", stringify!($atomic_type), "::update`).")]

            

        

            

                3326
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///

            

        

            

                3327
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// Note: This may call the function multiple times if the value has been changed from other threads in

            

        

            

                3328
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// the meantime, as long as the function returns `Some(_)`, but the function will have been applied

            

        

            

                3329
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// only once to the stored value.

            

        

            

                3330
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///

            

        

            

                3331
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// `try_update` takes two [`Ordering`] arguments to describe the memory ordering of this operation.

            

        

            

                3332
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// The first describes the required ordering for when the operation finally succeeds while the second

            

        

            

                3333
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// describes the required ordering for loads. These correspond to the success and failure orderings of

            

        

            

                3334
            

            

                
            

            

                
            #[doc = concat!("[`", stringify!($atomic_type), "::compare_exchange`]")]

            

        

            

                3335
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// respectively.

            

        

            

                3336
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///

            

        

            

                3337
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// Using [`Acquire`] as success ordering makes the store part

            

        

            

                3338
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// of this operation [`Relaxed`], and using [`Release`] makes the final successful load

            

        

            

                3339
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// [`Relaxed`]. The (failed) load ordering can only be [`SeqCst`], [`Acquire`] or [`Relaxed`].

            

        

            

                3340
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///

            

        

            

                3341
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// **Note**: This method is only available on platforms that support atomic operations on

            

        

            

                3342
            

            

                
            

            

                
            #[doc = concat!("[`", $s_int_type, "`].")]

            

        

            

                3343
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///

            

        

            

                3344
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// # Considerations

            

        

            

                3345
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///

            

        

            

                3346
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// This method is not magic; it is not provided by the hardware.

            

        

            

                3347
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// It is implemented in terms of

            

        

            

                3348
            

            

                
            

            

                
            #[doc = concat!("[`", stringify!($atomic_type), "::compare_exchange_weak`],")]

            

        

            

                3349
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// and suffers from the same drawbacks.

            

        

            

                3350
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// In particular, this method will not circumvent the [ABA Problem].

            

        

            

                3351
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///

            

        

            

                3352
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// [ABA Problem]: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ABA_problem

            

        

            

                3353
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///

            

        

            

                3354
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// # Examples

            

        

            

                3355
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///

            

        

            

                3356
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// ```rust

            

        

            

                3357
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// #![feature(atomic_try_update)]

            

        

            

                3358
            

            

                
            

            

                
            #[doc = concat!($extra_feature, "use std::sync::atomic::{", stringify!($atomic_type), ", Ordering};")]

            

        

            

                3359
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///

            

        

            

                3360
            

            

                
            

            

                
            #[doc = concat!("let x = ", stringify!($atomic_type), "::new(7);")]

            

        

            

                3361
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// assert_eq!(x.try_update(Ordering::SeqCst, Ordering::SeqCst, |_| None), Err(7));

            

        

            

                3362
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// assert_eq!(x.try_update(Ordering::SeqCst, Ordering::SeqCst, |x| Some(x + 1)), Ok(7));

            

        

            

                3363
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// assert_eq!(x.try_update(Ordering::SeqCst, Ordering::SeqCst, |x| Some(x + 1)), Ok(8));

            

        

            

                3364
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// assert_eq!(x.load(Ordering::SeqCst), 9);

            

        

            

                3365
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// ```

            

        

            

                3366
            

            

                
            

            

                
            #[inline]

            

        

            

                3367
            

            

                
            

            

                
            #[unstable(feature = "atomic_try_update", issue = "135894")]

            

        

            

                3368
            

            

                
            

            

                
            #[$cfg_cas]

            

        

            

                3369
            

            

                
            

            

                
            #[cfg_attr(miri, track_caller)] // even without panics, this helps for Miri backtraces

            

        

            

                3370
            

            

                
            

            

                
            pub fn try_update(

            

        

            

                3371
            

            

                
            

            

                
                &self,

            

        

            

                3372
            

            

                
            

            

                
                set_order: Ordering,

            

        

            

                3373
            

            

                
            

            

                
                fetch_order: Ordering,

            

        

            

                3374
            

            

                
            

            

                
                f: impl FnMut($int_type) -> Option<$int_type>,

            

        

            

                3375
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ) -> Result<$int_type, $int_type> {

            

        

            

                3376
            

            

                
            

            

                
                // FIXME(atomic_try_update): this is currently an unstable alias to `fetch_update`;

            

        

            

                3377
            

            

                
            

            

                
                //      when stabilizing, turn `fetch_update` into a deprecated alias to `try_update`.

            

        

            

                3378
            

            

                
            

            

                
                self.fetch_update(set_order, fetch_order, f)

            

        

            

                3379
            

            

                
            

            

                
            }

            

        

            

                3380
            

            

                
            

            

                

            

        

            

                3381
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// Fetches the value, applies a function to it that it return a new value.

            

        

            

                3382
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// The new value is stored and the old value is returned.

            

        

            

                3383
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///

            

        

            

                3384
            

            

                
            

            

                
            #[doc = concat!("See also: [`try_update`](`", stringify!($atomic_type), "::try_update`).")]

            

        

            

                3385
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///

            

        

            

                3386
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// Note: This may call the function multiple times if the value has been changed from other threads in

            

        

            

                3387
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// the meantime, but the function will have been applied only once to the stored value.

            

        

            

                3388
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///

            

        

            

                3389
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// `update` takes two [`Ordering`] arguments to describe the memory ordering of this operation.

            

        

            

                3390
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// The first describes the required ordering for when the operation finally succeeds while the second

            

        

            

                3391
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// describes the required ordering for loads. These correspond to the success and failure orderings of

            

        

            

                3392
            

            

                
            

            

                
            #[doc = concat!("[`", stringify!($atomic_type), "::compare_exchange`]")]

            

        

            

                3393
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// respectively.

            

        

            

                3394
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///

            

        

            

                3395
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// Using [`Acquire`] as success ordering makes the store part

            

        

            

                3396
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// of this operation [`Relaxed`], and using [`Release`] makes the final successful load

            

        

            

                3397
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// [`Relaxed`]. The (failed) load ordering can only be [`SeqCst`], [`Acquire`] or [`Relaxed`].

            

        

            

                3398
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///

            

        

            

                3399
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// **Note**: This method is only available on platforms that support atomic operations on

            

        

            

                3400
            

            

                
            

            

                
            #[doc = concat!("[`", $s_int_type, "`].")]

            

        

            

                3401
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///

            

        

            

                3402
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// # Considerations

            

        

            

                3403
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///

            

        

            

                3404
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// This method is not magic; it is not provided by the hardware.

            

        

            

                3405
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// It is implemented in terms of

            

        

            

                3406
            

            

                
            

            

                
            #[doc = concat!("[`", stringify!($atomic_type), "::compare_exchange_weak`],")]

            

        

            

                3407
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// and suffers from the same drawbacks.

            

        

            

                3408
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// In particular, this method will not circumvent the [ABA Problem].

            

        

            

                3409
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///

            

        

            

                3410
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// [ABA Problem]: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ABA_problem

            

        

            

                3411
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///

            

        

            

                3412
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// # Examples

            

        

            

                3413
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///

            

        

            

                3414
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// ```rust

            

        

            

                3415
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// #![feature(atomic_try_update)]

            

        

            

                3416
            

            

                
            

            

                
            #[doc = concat!($extra_feature, "use std::sync::atomic::{", stringify!($atomic_type), ", Ordering};")]

            

        

            

                3417
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///

            

        

            

                3418
            

            

                
            

            

                
            #[doc = concat!("let x = ", stringify!($atomic_type), "::new(7);")]

            

        

            

                3419
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// assert_eq!(x.update(Ordering::SeqCst, Ordering::SeqCst, |x| x + 1), 7);

            

        

            

                3420
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// assert_eq!(x.update(Ordering::SeqCst, Ordering::SeqCst, |x| x + 1), 8);

            

        

            

                3421
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// assert_eq!(x.load(Ordering::SeqCst), 9);

            

        

            

                3422
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// ```

            

        

            

                3423
            

            

                
            

            

                
            #[inline]

            

        

            

                3424
            

            

                
            

            

                
            #[unstable(feature = "atomic_try_update", issue = "135894")]

            

        

            

                3425
            

            

                
            

            

                
            #[$cfg_cas]

            

        

            

                3426
            

            

                
            

            

                
            #[cfg_attr(miri, track_caller)] // even without panics, this helps for Miri backtraces

            

        

            

                3427
            

            

                
            

            

                
            pub fn update(

            

        

            

                3428
            

            

                
            

            

                
                &self,

            

        

            

                3429
            

            

                
            

            

                
                set_order: Ordering,

            

        

            

                3430
            

            

                
            

            

                
                fetch_order: Ordering,

            

        

            

                3431
            

            

                
            

            

                
                mut f: impl FnMut($int_type) -> $int_type,

            

        

            

                3432
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ) -> $int_type {

            

        

            

                3433
            

            

                
            

            

                
                let mut prev = self.load(fetch_order);

            

        

            

                3434
            

            

                
            

            

                
                loop {

            

        

            

                3435
            

            

                
            

            

                
                    match self.compare_exchange_weak(prev, f(prev), set_order, fetch_order) {

            

        

            

                3436
            

            

                
            

            

                
                        Ok(x) => break x,

            

        

            

                3437
            

            

                
            

            

                
                        Err(next_prev) => prev = next_prev,

            

        

            

                3438
            

            

                
            

            

                
                    }

            

        

            

                3439
            

            

                
            

            

                
                }

            

        

            

                3440
            

            

                
            

            

                
            }

            

        

            

                3441
            

            

                
            

            

                

            

        

            

                3442
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// Maximum with the current value.

            

        

            

                3443
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///

            

        

            

                3444
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// Finds the maximum of the current value and the argument `val`, and

            

        

            

                3445
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// sets the new value to the result.

            

        

            

                3446
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///

            

        

            

                3447
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// Returns the previous value.

            

        

            

                3448
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///

            

        

            

                3449
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// `fetch_max` takes an [`Ordering`] argument which describes the memory ordering

            

        

            

                3450
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// of this operation. All ordering modes are possible. Note that using

            

        

            

                3451
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// [`Acquire`] makes the store part of this operation [`Relaxed`], and

            

        

            

                3452
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// using [`Release`] makes the load part [`Relaxed`].

            

        

            

                3453
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///

            

        

            

                3454
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// **Note**: This method is only available on platforms that support atomic operations on

            

        

            

                3455
            

            

                
            

            

                
            #[doc = concat!("[`", $s_int_type, "`].")]

            

        

            

                3456
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///

            

        

            

                3457
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// # Examples

            

        

            

                3458
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///

            

        

            

                3459
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// ```

            

        

            

                3460
            

            

                
            

            

                
            #[doc = concat!($extra_feature, "use std::sync::atomic::{", stringify!($atomic_type), ", Ordering};")]

            

        

            

                3461
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///

            

        

            

                3462
            

            

                
            

            

                
            #[doc = concat!("let foo = ", stringify!($atomic_type), "::new(23);")]

            

        

            

                3463
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// assert_eq!(foo.fetch_max(42, Ordering::SeqCst), 23);

            

        

            

                3464
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// assert_eq!(foo.load(Ordering::SeqCst), 42);

            

        

            

                3465
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// ```

            

        

            

                3466
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///

            

        

            

                3467
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// If you want to obtain the maximum value in one step, you can use the following:

            

        

            

                3468
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///

            

        

            

                3469
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// ```

            

        

            

                3470
            

            

                
            

            

                
            #[doc = concat!($extra_feature, "use std::sync::atomic::{", stringify!($atomic_type), ", Ordering};")]

            

        

            

                3471
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///

            

        

            

                3472
            

            

                
            

            

                
            #[doc = concat!("let foo = ", stringify!($atomic_type), "::new(23);")]

            

        

            

                3473
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// let bar = 42;

            

        

            

                3474
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// let max_foo = foo.fetch_max(bar, Ordering::SeqCst).max(bar);

            

        

            

                3475
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// assert!(max_foo == 42);

            

        

            

                3476
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// ```

            

        

            

                3477
            

            

                
            

            

                
            #[inline]

            

        

            

                3478
            

            

                
            

            

                
            #[stable(feature = "atomic_min_max", since = "1.45.0")]

            

        

            

                3479
            

            

                
            

            

                
            #[$cfg_cas]

            

        

            

                3480
            

            

                
            

            

                
            #[cfg_attr(miri, track_caller)] // even without panics, this helps for Miri backtraces

            

        

            

                3481
            

            

                14
            

            

                
            pub fn fetch_max(&self, val: $int_type, order: Ordering) -> $int_type {

            

        

            

                3482
            

            

                
            

            

                
                // SAFETY: data races are prevented by atomic intrinsics.

            

        

            

                3483
            

            

                14
            

            

                
                unsafe { $max_fn(self.v.get(), val, order) }

            

        

            

                3484
            

            

                14
            

            

                
            }

            

        

            

                3485
            

            

                
            

            

                

            

        

            

                3486
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// Minimum with the current value.

            

        

            

                3487
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///

            

        

            

                3488
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// Finds the minimum of the current value and the argument `val`, and

            

        

            

                3489
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// sets the new value to the result.

            

        

            

                3490
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///

            

        

            

                3491
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// Returns the previous value.

            

        

            

                3492
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///

            

        

            

                3493
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// `fetch_min` takes an [`Ordering`] argument which describes the memory ordering

            

        

            

                3494
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// of this operation. All ordering modes are possible. Note that using

            

        

            

                3495
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// [`Acquire`] makes the store part of this operation [`Relaxed`], and

            

        

            

                3496
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// using [`Release`] makes the load part [`Relaxed`].

            

        

            

                3497
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///

            

        

            

                3498
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// **Note**: This method is only available on platforms that support atomic operations on

            

        

            

                3499
            

            

                
            

            

                
            #[doc = concat!("[`", $s_int_type, "`].")]

            

        

            

                3500
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///

            

        

            

                3501
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// # Examples

            

        

            

                3502
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///

            

        

            

                3503
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// ```

            

        

            

                3504
            

            

                
            

            

                
            #[doc = concat!($extra_feature, "use std::sync::atomic::{", stringify!($atomic_type), ", Ordering};")]

            

        

            

                3505
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///

            

        

            

                3506
            

            

                
            

            

                
            #[doc = concat!("let foo = ", stringify!($atomic_type), "::new(23);")]

            

        

            

                3507
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// assert_eq!(foo.fetch_min(42, Ordering::Relaxed), 23);

            

        

            

                3508
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// assert_eq!(foo.load(Ordering::Relaxed), 23);

            

        

            

                3509
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// assert_eq!(foo.fetch_min(22, Ordering::Relaxed), 23);

            

        

            

                3510
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// assert_eq!(foo.load(Ordering::Relaxed), 22);

            

        

            

                3511
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// ```

            

        

            

                3512
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///

            

        

            

                3513
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// If you want to obtain the minimum value in one step, you can use the following:

            

        

            

                3514
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///

            

        

            

                3515
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// ```

            

        

            

                3516
            

            

                
            

            

                
            #[doc = concat!($extra_feature, "use std::sync::atomic::{", stringify!($atomic_type), ", Ordering};")]

            

        

            

                3517
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///

            

        

            

                3518
            

            

                
            

            

                
            #[doc = concat!("let foo = ", stringify!($atomic_type), "::new(23);")]

            

        

            

                3519
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// let bar = 12;

            

        

            

                3520
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// let min_foo = foo.fetch_min(bar, Ordering::SeqCst).min(bar);

            

        

            

                3521
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// assert_eq!(min_foo, 12);

            

        

            

                3522
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// ```

            

        

            

                3523
            

            

                
            

            

                
            #[inline]

            

        

            

                3524
            

            

                
            

            

                
            #[stable(feature = "atomic_min_max", since = "1.45.0")]

            

        

            

                3525
            

            

                
            

            

                
            #[$cfg_cas]

            

        

            

                3526
            

            

                
            

            

                
            #[cfg_attr(miri, track_caller)] // even without panics, this helps for Miri backtraces

            

        

            

                3527
            

            

                14
            

            

                
            pub fn fetch_min(&self, val: $int_type, order: Ordering) -> $int_type {

            

        

            

                3528
            

            

                
            

            

                
                // SAFETY: data races are prevented by atomic intrinsics.

            

        

            

                3529
            

            

                14
            

            

                
                unsafe { $min_fn(self.v.get(), val, order) }

            

        

            

                3530
            

            

                14
            

            

                
            }

            

        

            

                3531
            

            

                
            

            

                

            

        

            

                3532
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// Returns a mutable pointer to the underlying integer.

            

        

            

                3533
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///

            

        

            

                3534
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// Doing non-atomic reads and writes on the resulting integer can be a data race.

            

        

            

                3535
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// This method is mostly useful for FFI, where the function signature may use

            

        

            

                3536
            

            

                
            

            

                
            #[doc = concat!("`*mut ", stringify!($int_type), "` instead of `&", stringify!($atomic_type), "`.")]

            

        

            

                3537
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///

            

        

            

                3538
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// Returning an `*mut` pointer from a shared reference to this atomic is safe because the

            

        

            

                3539
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// atomic types work with interior mutability. All modifications of an atomic change the value

            

        

            

                3540
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// through a shared reference, and can do so safely as long as they use atomic operations. Any

            

        

            

                3541
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// use of the returned raw pointer requires an `unsafe` block and still has to uphold the same

            

        

            

                3542
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// restriction: operations on it must be atomic.

            

        

            

                3543
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///

            

        

            

                3544
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// # Examples

            

        

            

                3545
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///

            

        

            

                3546
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// ```ignore (extern-declaration)

            

        

            

                3547
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// # fn main() {

            

        

            

                3548
            

            

                
            

            

                
            #[doc = concat!($extra_feature, "use std::sync::atomic::", stringify!($atomic_type), ";")]

            

        

            

                3549
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///

            

        

            

                3550
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// extern "C" {

            

        

            

                3551
            

            

                
            

            

                
            #[doc = concat!("    fn my_atomic_op(arg: *mut ", stringify!($int_type), ");")]

            

        

            

                3552
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// }

            

        

            

                3553
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///

            

        

            

                3554
            

            

                
            

            

                
            #[doc = concat!("let atomic = ", stringify!($atomic_type), "::new(1);")]

            

        

            

                3555
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///

            

        

            

                3556
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// // SAFETY: Safe as long as `my_atomic_op` is atomic.

            

        

            

                3557
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// unsafe {

            

        

            

                3558
            

            

                
            

            

                
            ///     my_atomic_op(atomic.as_ptr());

            

        

            

                3559
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// }

            

        

            

                3560
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// # }

            

        

            

                3561
            

            

                
            

            

                
            /// ```

            

        

            

                3562
            

            

                
            

            

                
            #[inline]

            

        

            

                3563
            

            

                
            

            

                
            #[stable(feature = "atomic_as_ptr", since = "1.70.0")]

            

        

            

                3564
            

            

                
            

            

                
            #[rustc_const_stable(feature = "atomic_as_ptr", since = "1.70.0")]

            

        

            

                3565
            

            

                
            

            

                
            #[rustc_never_returns_null_ptr]

            

        

            

                3566
            

            

                
            

            

                
            pub const fn as_ptr(&self) -> *mut $int_type {

            

        

            

                3567
            

            

                
            

            

                
                self.v.get()

            

        

            

                3568
            

            

                
            

            

                
            }

            

        

            

                3569
            

            

                
            

            

                
        }

            

        

            

                3570
            

            

                
            

            

                
    }

            

        

            

                3571
            

            

                
            

            

                
}

            

        

            

                3572
            

            

                
            

            

                

            

        

            

                3573
            

            

                
            

            

                
#[cfg(target_has_atomic_load_store = "8")]

            

        

            

                3574
            

            

                
            

            

                
#[cfg(not(feature = "ferrocene_certified"))]

            

        

            

                3575

                3576
            

            

                
            

            

                
    cfg(target_has_atomic = "8"),

            

        

            

                3577
            

            

                
            

            

                
    cfg(target_has_atomic_equal_alignment = "8"),

            

        

            

                3578
            

            

                
            

            

                
    stable(feature = "integer_atomics_stable", since = "1.34.0"),

            

        

            

                3579
            

            

                
            

            

                
    stable(feature = "integer_atomics_stable", since = "1.34.0"),

            

        

            

                3580
            

            

                
            

            

                
    stable(feature = "integer_atomics_stable", since = "1.34.0"),

            

        

            

                3581
            

            

                
            

            

                
    stable(feature = "integer_atomics_stable", since = "1.34.0"),

            

        

            

                3582
            

            

                
            

            

                
    stable(feature = "integer_atomics_stable", since = "1.34.0"),

            

        

            

                3583
            

            

                
            

            

                
    stable(feature = "integer_atomics_stable", since = "1.34.0"),

                3586
            

            

                
            

            

                
    rustc_diagnostic_item = "AtomicI8",

            

        

            

                3587
            

            

                
            

            

                
    "i8",

            

        

            

                3588
            

            

                
            

            

                
    "",

            

        

            

                3589
            

            

                
            

            

                
    atomic_min, atomic_max,

            

        

            

                3590

    i8 AtomicI8

            

        

            

                3592
            

            

                
            

            

                
}

                3594

                3595

atomic_int! {

            

        

            

                3675

                3841
            

            

                
            

            

                
    "16" 2

            

        

            

                3842

                3847

                3848
            

            

                
            

            

                
fn strongest_failure_ordering(order: Ordering) -> Ordering {

            

        

            

                3849
            

            

                
            

            

                
    match order {

            

        

            

                3850
            

            

                
            

            

                
        Release => Relaxed,

            

        

            

                3851
            

            

                
            

            

                
        Relaxed => Relaxed,

            

        

            

                3852
            

            

                
            

            

                
        SeqCst => SeqCst,

            

        

            

                3853
            

            

                
            

            

                
        Acquire => Acquire,

            

        

            

                3854
            

            

                
            

            

                
        AcqRel => Acquire,

            

        

            

                3855
            

            

                
            

            

                
    }

            

        

            

                3856
            

            

                
            

            

                
}

            

        

            

                3857
            

            

                
            

            

                

            

        

            

                3858
            

            

                
            

            

                
#[inline]

            

        

            

                3859
            

            

                
            

            

                
#[cfg_attr(miri, track_caller)] // even without panics, this helps for Miri backtraces

            

        

            

                3860
            

            

                8194
            

            

                
unsafe fn atomic_store<T: Copy>(dst: *mut T, val: T, order: Ordering) {

            

        

            

                3861
            

            

                
            

            

                
    // SAFETY: the caller must uphold the safety contract for `atomic_store`.

            

        

            

                3862
            

            

                
            

            

                
    unsafe {

            

        

            

                3863
            

            

                8194
            

            

                
        match order {

            

        

            

                3864
            

            

                2
            

            

                
            Relaxed => intrinsics::atomic_store_relaxed(dst, val),

            

        

            

                3865
            

            

                5424
            

            

                
            Release => intrinsics::atomic_store_release(dst, val),

            

        

            

                3866
            

            

                2766
            

            

                
            SeqCst => intrinsics::atomic_store_seqcst(dst, val),

            

        

            

                3867
            

            

                1
            

            

                
            Acquire => panic!("there is no such thing as an acquire store"),

            

        

            

                3868
            

            

                1
            

            

                
            AcqRel => panic!("there is no such thing as an acquire-release store"),

            

        

            

                3869
            

            

                
            

            

                
        }

            

        

            

                3870
            

            

                
            

            

                
    }

            

        

            

                3871
            

            

                8192
            

            

                
}

            

        

            

                3872
            

            

                
            

            

                

            

        

            

                3873
            

            

                
            

            

                
#[inline]

            

        

            

                3874
            

            

                
            

            

                
#[cfg_attr(miri, track_caller)] // even without panics, this helps for Miri backtraces

            

        

            

                3875
            

            

                58906
            

            

                
unsafe fn atomic_load<T: Copy>(dst: *const T, order: Ordering) -> T {

            

        

            

                3876
            

            

                
            

            

                
    // SAFETY: the caller must uphold the safety contract for `atomic_load`.

            

        

            

                3877
            

            

                
            

            

                
    unsafe {

            

        

            

                3878
            

            

                58906
            

            

                
        match order {

            

        

            

                3879
            

            

                28611
            

            

                
            Relaxed => intrinsics::atomic_load_relaxed(dst),

            

        

            

                3880
            

            

                22185
            

            

                
            Acquire => intrinsics::atomic_load_acquire(dst),

            

        

            

                3881
            

            

                8108
            

            

                
            SeqCst => intrinsics::atomic_load_seqcst(dst),

            

        

            

                3882
            

            

                1
            

            

                
            Release => panic!("there is no such thing as a release load"),

            

        

            

                3883
            

            

                1
            

            

                
            AcqRel => panic!("there is no such thing as an acquire-release load"),

            

        

            

                3884
            

            

                
            

            

                
        }

            

        

            

                3885
            

            

                
            

            

                
    }

            

        

            

                3886
            

            

                58904
            

            

                
}

            

        

            

                3887
            

            

                
            

            

                

            

        

            

                3888
            

            

                
            

            

                
#[inline]

            

        

            

                3889
            

            

                
            

            

                
#[cfg(target_has_atomic)]

            

        

            

                3890

                3894
            

            

                8876
            

            

                
        match order {

            

        

            

                3895
            

            

                1

                3896
            

            

                1

                3897
